title: Refrigerator Mac'n'Cheese
description: Make fresh Mac'n'Cheese from the random bits in your fridge!
ingredients: Cheese Bits, Heavy Cream, Pasta, Salt, Nutmeg
instructions: Bring Heavy cream to a simmer.  Add cheese bits (grated or in small cut pieces) and stir until melted.  Add a pinch of nutmeg and salt to taste.  Reduce heat to Low.  On a separate burner cook your pasta, stirring cheese sauce occasionally.  Then, drain pasta, toss pasta in sauce and enjoy!
author: Joe Shmoe
